111  void operator<<(SeqViewDouble& Data) {
112  Dmatrix* in = Data.GetData();
113 
114  if (in->size1() != 1) {
115  LogSevere("TransientDetection: multichannels not implemented resize");
116  throw bad_matrix_size("Wrong Matrix size");
117  }
118 
119  SetData(*in, Data.GetScale());
120  mStartTime = Data.GetStart();
121  mSampling = Data.GetSampling();
122  //mStartTime -= mSampling * static_cast<double> (WDF2Classify::GetDataNeeded());
123  }
124 
125  void operator()(SeqViewDouble& Data, double sigma) {
126  Dmatrix* in = Data.GetData();
127 
128  if (in->size1() != 1) {
129  LogSevere("TransientDetection: multichannels not implemented resize");
130  throw bad_matrix_size("Wrong Matrix size");
131  }
132 
133  SetData(*in, Data.GetScale());
134  mStartTime = Data.GetStart();
135  mSampling = Data.GetSampling();
136  mWavThres.SetSigma(sigma);
137 
138  }
139 
140 
141 
142 
143 
144  int operator()(EventFullFeatured& Ev) {
145  double abov;
146  Dvector Cmax;
147  int level;
148  std::string Wave;
149  unsigned int res = GetDataVector(abov, Cmax, level, Wave);
150 
151  if (res == 1) {
152 
153  mEvFF.mlevel = static_cast<double> (level);
154 
155  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mNCoeff; i++) {
156  mEvFF.mCoeff[i] = Cmax[i];
157  }
158  mEvFF.mTime = mStartTime;
159  mEvFF.mSNR = abov;
160  mEvFF.mWave = Wave;
161  Ev = mEvFF;
162  }
163 
164  mStartTime += mSampling * static_cast<double> (mStep);
165  return res;
166  }

175  unsigned int GetDataVector(double& abov, Dvector& Cmax, int& levelR, std::string& Wave);
176 
177  void GetEvent(EventFullFeatured &Ev) {
178 
179  Ev.mTime = mEvFF.mTime;
180  Ev.mSNR = mEvFF.mSNR;
181  Ev.mWave = mEvFF.mWave;
182  Ev.mCoeff = mEvFF.mCoeff;
183  }
